verbs.description: [ARG0: Trump 's lawyer Michael Cohen] [ARGM-ADV: reportedly] [V: spiked] [ARG1: a US Weekly story about Donald Trump Jr. 's alleged affair with musician Aubrey O'Day] .
Trump 's lawyer Michael Cohen reportedly spiked a US Weekly story about Donald Trump Jr. 's [V: alleged] [ARG1: affair] with musician Aubrey O'Day .
